DOC.brief_summary: To conduct epidemiologic study persistent pulmonary hypertension newborn ( PPHN ) infant .
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiology Persistent Pulmonary Hypertension Newborn - SCOR Lung Biology Diseases Infants Children
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The study epidemiology persistent pulmonary hypertension newborn ( PPHN ) subproject within Specialized Center Research ( SCOR ) Lung Biology Diseases Infants Children . The SCOR subproject award December , 1991 . Dollars estimate 20 percent total center dollar . DESIGN NARRATIVE : Data previous study PPHN analyze . The objective : identify effect variety potentially adverse prenatal exposure interview data ; formulate multi-variate model risk PPHN determine smoking use prostaglandin inhibitor increase risk PPHN ; explore association PPHN history illicit drug use maternal hypoxia ; examine relationship postnatal care perinatal risk factor incidence outcome PPHN ; test relationship PPHN biochemical presence nicotine drug neonatal urine . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
